Package ru.bivchallenge.persistence

Class CompanyLocalProvider

java.lang.Object
ru.bivchallenge.persistence.AbstractLocalDataProvider<Company>
ru.bivchallenge.persistence.CompanyLocalProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataProvider<Company>
public class CompanyLocalProvider extends AbstractLocalDataProvider<Company>
The CompanyLocalProvider class is responsible for providing Company data from a local CSV file. It extends AbstractLocalDataProvider to leverage common CSV reading functionality.

This class uses a CsvReader to read and parse company data from the file specified in the CastleConfig. It also provides mechanisms to repair data if necessary.

See Also:
